琖字的基本解释

琖
zhǎn
古同“盏”，小杯子。

琖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》阻限切，上産，莊。］
(1)小杯子。
(2)特指酒杯。
(3)量词。酒、茶、灯的计量单位。

琖字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　琖； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页734第03
【唐韻】【韻會】?阻限切，音醆。【說文】玉爵也。夏曰琖，殷曰斝，周曰爵。【廣韻】玉琖，小杯。【禮·明堂位】爵用玉琖仍雕。【釋文】夏爵名，用玉飾之。　【說文】或作盞。【玉篇】亦作?。【集韻】亦作湔?。

琖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
琖字的起名意思

小杯子。

winecup
Basic explanation of words
winecup
zhǎn
The ancient same "bowl", small cup.
winecup
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" restricts cutting, high production, Zhuang. ]
(1) Small cup.
(2) Especially refers to wine glasses.
(3) Quantifiers. The unit of measurement for wine, tea, and lamps.
winecup
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　琖; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 734 No. 03
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Restricted cut, sound glutinous. [Said the text] Yujue also. Xia said 琖, Yin said 疝, Zhou Yuejue. [Guang Yun] Yuyao, small cup. 【Rite·Ming Hall】The Jade is still carved with jade. [Explanation] Xia Jue's name, decorated with jade.　【Said Wen】or Zuozhan. [Jade articles] also made?. [Ji Yun] also make it?.
